msg:
# When amending a patch, this will only give the option to select a patch that contains the word 'hello'.
darcs amend --patch 'hello'

When amending a patch, this will only give the option to select a patch that contains the word 'hello'.

# your_comment_here
darcs amend -patch 'hello'

# When amending a patch, this will only give the option to select a patch that contains the word 'hello',
darcs amend -patch 'hello'
